name: Figma Components
description:
My personal collection of adaptable components in Auto Layout and Variants with Light/Night mode and examples.


Change Log

March 29, 2022

- Added:

  • Avatar, Weather, List Item, List, Checkbox, and Radio components.


- Changed:

  • Components that have avatar/icon to Avatar component.


- Fixed:

  • Components description.


- Removed:

  • Variant examples between avatar/icon.


March 23, 2022

- Added:

  • Examples for avatar/icon variants.


- Changed:

  • Component structure with main(base).
  • Switch variants for night mode, avatar/icon, and examples.


- Fixed:

  • "Missing Library" styles.


March 21, 2022

  • Published to Community hub.
